澄み渡った空に白線 あの地平を超えて\r\n: There's a white line in the clear sky, beyond that horizon
始まりはちょっと軽い期待で\r\n: It started with a bit of light expectations
その欠片 そっとポケットしまって\r\n: I gently tucked that piece away in my pocket
屋上 遠い空の向こう見ていた\r\n: On the rooftop, I looked beyond the distant sky
この足でどこにいけるかなんて\r\n: I wonder where these legs will take me
わかってないけど わかっているんだ\r\n: I don't know, but I do
白昼 淡い月に 手をのばした\r\n: In broad daylight, I reached for the faint moon
かすれたエコー でも答えはもう\r\n: I hear a faint echo, but the answer's already there
はじめからちゃんと持っていたんだよ\r\n: Turns out I had it right from the beginning
もっと高く高くまで 羽ばたいてみたい\r\n: I wanna flap my wings even higher and higher
今日に未来色の軌道描いて 地平の先まで\r\n: Today I'll draw a future-colored track to the end of the earth's horizon
届かない歌はない 迷いはいらない！\r\n: There's no song I can't send out, so I don't need to hesitate!
どんな世界も瞬間も揺るがない\r\n: No matter the world or moment, I won't waver
まだ遠く遠くまで 広がった空に\r\n: Under the sky that stretches far and beyond
やっと踏み出すこの一歩なんて\r\n: Though this step that I finally took
届かない場所へと続いていく\r\n: I'll keep going to a place out of reach
どんな風に雨に消えない\r\n: How did the white line I drew
白線を描く――\r\n: didn't wash away in the rain―
もっと 高く高くまで 羽ばたいていたい\r\n: I wanna flap my wings even higher and higher
そして彼方色で繋ぐリープ 地平で待ってて\r\n: And the leap that connects with the colors beyond awaits at the horizon
もう願いに嘘はない ここが好き！\r\n: My wishes are no longer lies, I like it here!
どんな世界も瞬間も輝く\r\n: No matter the world or moment
澄み渡った空に白線\r\n: There's a white line in the clear sky
もっと高く高く高く飛んでいける！\r\n: I can fly even higher, higher, and higher!
